attributes.action: not dock points from Accrington Stanley
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Accrington Stanley are the most famous little club in England and will probably get relagated back to non-league football if they are docked points. Also Stanley have only just returned to the league after 44 years so it would be unfair for them to be relagated.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
